alert.note: Alert for Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 11:51PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Randall and southeastern Potter Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1151 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Amarillo. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amarillo and Bushland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
